Brief Role : Customer Service Associate 

Job Description 

A. Customer Service Associate ( Voice) 

Job Description: - Inbound Customer Service / Upselling. Interface with customers via inbound or outbound calls or the Internet for the purpose of passively (i.e.; order taking) or actively selling products and services. Roles & Responsibilities: - Greet customers in a courteous, friendly, and professional manner using agreed upon procedures. Clarify customer requirements; probe for and confirm understanding of requirements or problem. Support customers across Telecommunication, Financial Services & Healthcare vertical.Conduct needs- based selling by using non- scripted probing techniques to determine customer needs and to offer the most appropriate product or service to address their needs. 

Candidate Profile- Any Graduate / Under- Graduate / drop out / pursuing Bachelors- any fresher can apply. BE/ Btech freshers are not eligible.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Flexible with 24/ 7 Environment.Salary up to 26, 000 take home & attractive Incentives amount.

Additional Benefits- Two way A/ C cabs. (Convergys was awarded for best in industry transport service).Medical insurance worth 1 lakhs.Group Term Life Insurance / Group Personal accident Insurance worth 5 lakhsGratuityEducation Assistance plan Annual entitlement of up to INR 24, 000. Employee / Corporate discounts at majority of Retail Chains / Hospitals / Laboratories.
